name: Embers (JonahSagers)
description:
It's a quiet night, and you've just lit a fire by your campsite.  It may be raining, but that won't stop you from staying warm.

Click on the woodpile and umbrella to interact with them, and press space to throw wood onto the fire.  That's it.

This is the first project that I can actually say I've finished.  I had a lot of fun working with particles, lights, and every other tool that a backend dev can use to make up for their crippling art issues.  I always get caught up in trying to add more and more features, but here I'm happy to just stick with the basics.  Hope you enjoy it.
